create.category: The channel category {{category}} has been created.
create.text: The text channel {{channel}} has been created.
create.voice: The voice channel {{channel}} has been created.

delete.category: The channel category {{channel}} has been deleted.
delete.text: The text channel {{channel}} has been deleted.
delete.voice: The voice channel {{channel}} has been deleted.

name.text: The text channel {{oldChannel}} is now called {{newChannel}}.
name.voice: The voice channel {{oldChannel}} is now called {{newChannel}}.

topic.remove: The channel {{channel}}'s topic has been deleted.

role.add: The member {{member}} has now the role {{role}}.
role.remove: The member {{member}} doesn't anymore have the role {{role}}.
